v2_features.version_field: Added 'version' field to ScraperEvent, defaults to '1.0', '2.0' for v2 events
v2_features.timing_metadata: step.completed and step.failed include timing with started_at, completed_at, duration_ms, duration_seconds
v2_features.selector_results: step.completed includes selectors dict with name, value, found, count, attribute, error
v2_features.extraction_results: step.completed includes extraction dict with field_name, value, status, confidence
v2_features.backward_compatibility: v1 events don't include version field in output to maintain compatibility

acceptance_criteria.run_tests: PASS - All 30 v2 event tests pass, 209 total tests pass
acceptance_criteria.event_output_version: PASS - V2 events include version field set to '2.0'
acceptance_criteria.event_output_timing: PASS - step.completed includes timing metadata with duration_ms
acceptance_criteria.event_output_selectors: PASS - step.completed includes selector resolution results
acceptance_criteria.event_output_extraction: PASS - step.completed includes extraction field results
